description: Adds or updates permissions for the specified private image.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the private image.

parameters.name: SharedAccountId
parameters.description: The 12-digit identifier of the AWS account for which you want add or update image permissions.

parameters.name: ImagePermissions
parameters.description: The permissions for the image. allowFleet (boolean) --- Indicates whether the image can be used for a fleet. allowImageBuilder (boolean) --- Indicates whether the image can be used for an image builder.

nested_params.name: allowFleet
nested_params.description: Indicates whether the image can be used for a fleet.

nested_params.name: allowImageBuilder
nested_params.description: Indicates whether the image can be used for an image builder.
